description:
A Save Editor for Final Fantasy 7


Features
- New Item Tab Widget #82 (sithlord48)
Bug Fixes
- crash on character export #80 (sithlord48)
- guard style workarouds #81 (sithlord48)
- party tab show / hide boost button on id change. expose characterEditor #82 (sithlord48)
Builds
- Add option to clean trs files #81 (sithlord48)
Continuous Integration
- use Qt install action v4 (sithlord48)
Commits
- 03eee51: Release 1.15.1 (sithlord48)
- 2f11252: Simplify the about dialog (sithlord48) #81
- 43253ca: add missing translations for battle strings (sithlord48)
- b8ee245: use ff7tk 1.2.0 (sithlord48) #82
- 66a2219: better branding colors for flathub (sithlord48) #82
- 3997e11: Reuse Compliance (sithlord48) #83
- 47b1c95: Release 1.16.0 (sithlord48)
